[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt transition from historical account to modern pilgrim practices without clear linking sentence.
[CLARITY]: Assumption of reader's prior knowledge about the significance of certain locations (e.g., Selling, Chartham, Harbledown) without brief explanation.
